word: The Holy Spirit's presence and power in the hearts of the professed people of God is their only hope in these last days of peril. Let not the impression be given to any minds that there is in human nature a power to work out its purity and develop a beautiful character, for this is not true. This is Satan's fallacy. "Without Me," said Christ, "ye can do nothing" (John 15:5). The completeness of man is in Christ Jesus. . . .
